import React, { useState } from 'react' import MRouter from './../router/index' import {HashRouter, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import styles from './Default.module.scss' import LogoImg from './../assets/pcImg/logo.png' import CustomImg from './../assets/pcImg/customer.png' export default function DefaultLayout() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState(0); const changeLinkTab = (num: number) => { setActiveTab(num); } return (
